EmailTemplate.subject: YessToCode Kids Coding Course
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to YessToCode
Hello,
{!Lead.Name}
Congratulations on your first step toward a brighter future.
Coding is the most demanding skill today in this IT world. Our Kids Coding Course gives your child immense exposure to the coding and technical aspects. This program is a wholesome pack of
Live classes Child-friendly, Pedagogical, and Dynamic tutors Introduction to the coding environment Availability of different coding languages to learn. Practice Assessments Doubt Sessions Weekly parents Meeting Kid's Performance Report
What Happens Next?
Our Executive will contact you and provide details of the Kids Coding course. Thank you for contacting us
Any questions?
CONTACT US DIRECTLY →
